mapper.select: SELECT i.item_name,d.data,i.unit,t.eq_direction from sd_devices t left join `sd_device_type_item` i on t.eq_type = i.device_type_id left join sd_device_data d on i.id = d.item_id and t.eq_id = d.device_id where 1=1 and t.eq_type ='17' and t.eq_tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT i.item_name,d.data,i.unit,t.eq_direction from sd_devices t left join `sd_device_type_item` i on t.eq_type = i.device_type_id left join sd_device_data d on i.id = d.item_id and t.eq_id = d.device_id where 1=1 and t.eq_type ='19' and i.id = '1' and t.eq_tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT i.item_name,d.data,i.unit,t.eq_direction from sd_devices t left join `sd_device_type_item` i on t.eq_type = i.device_type_id left join sd_device_data d on i.id = d.item_id and t.eq_id = d.device_id where 1=1 and t.eq_type ='19' and i.id = '2' and t.eq_tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT i.item_name,d.data,i.unit,t.eq_direction from sd_devices t left join `sd_device_type_item` i on t.eq_type = i.device_type_id left join sd_device_data d on i.id = d.item_id and t.eq_id = d.device_id where 1=1 and t.eq_type ='15' and t.eq_tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT i.item_name,IFNULL(d.data,'') as data,i.unit,t.eq_direction from sd_devices t left join `sd_device_type_item` i on t.eq_type = i.device_type_id left join sd_device_data d on i.id = d.item_id and t.eq_id = d.device_id where 1=1 and t.eq_type in ('5','18') and t.eq_tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

SELECT i.item_name,IFNULL(d.data,'') AS data,IFNULL(i.unit,'') AS unit,IFNULL(t.eq_direction,'') AS eq_direction from sd_devices t left join `sd_device_type_item` i on t.eq_type = i.device_type_id left join sd_device_data d on i.id = d.item_id and t.eq_id = d.device_id where 1=1 and t.eq_type = '28' and t.eq_tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}

select eq_direction,count(distinct eq_type) typeNum,count(eq_id) deviceNum, count(eq_status)statusNum,count(eq_status='1' or null) onlineNum,count(eq_status='2' or null) offlineNum,count(eq_status='3' or null) faultNum from sd_devices where 1=1 and eq_tunnel_id = #{tunnelId} group by eq_direction
